name: Christopher Marcek
text: Id have to say i wasn't expecting a good experience but i was actually wrong. I went and got 2 medium pizzas and they were both hot and delicious. Also i didn't have to wait to get them either. Perfect visit.

name: Charles McNeely
text:
Food is good, typical for Pizza Hut. Service is good to very good depending on who your waiter is. Generally the manager trains his/her people well.
Let's face it that's the difference  one Pizza Hut to another. They do a good job with the food and the customers.

name: Charlene Chambers
text: Brooke took my order on the phone tonight. She was very detailed and polite! Super sweet young lady

name: Mike Young
text: Pizza is always correctly done, ready on time and HOT HOT HOT..... Our go-to HUT... just wish they delivered to my area CSU-Trident area.

name: Coryssa Nikky West
text: The food was good and the cashier was nice. They ran out of the proper size pizza box though. Because of this my pizza was a round instead of a square. The crust on a square pan pizza is a bit different but not that big of a deal. I just …More

name: Lizeth Panuco
text: Love the service! Called in to get a pick up order and the lady over the phone was so nice!!! When I got here this gentleman named Josh was so courteous and took the time to show me my order!! …More

name: Kendra Edwards
text: As much as I love Pizza Hut. I will never buy anything from this one ever again. How you not take Pizza Hut coupons ??? The guy who took my money was nice and apologize, but that manager wasn't management material. The worst I’ve ever been to.

name: Kim Melo
text: Love the 7.99 special. It was fresh and delicious

name: Dorathy Benedict
text: THE MOST DELICIOUS PIZZA! Go with a group and try several types. Be prepared to wait at least an hour or more but it's worth it.

name: Elizabeth Lowndes
text: Teen age comfort food at its best!!

name: Aaliyah Smalls
text: Placed my order, called back to correct it and was on hold for 20 minutes!! I got hung up on twice as well so I wasn’t able to correct my order!! Customer service is HORRIBLE nobody will answer the phone in a reasonable time.

name: Thomas Therrell
text: Online app a disaster going on 2 years now. Store will not honor online deals despite crashing app. Oh and enough of mexican phone voice we know what's up.

name: SHAWN
text: I'm very disappointed in my order they didn't give me the right order. When I call back to tell them it was wrong. She ask if I wanted to order I said yes and I  tell her what I wanted. So I'm waiting for my order for a hour and call them back. She to the manager I never ask for the order but I did bc she told me the price.

name: 90cln
text: It's on par with any pizza hut I have been to.  This one is delivery and consistently good. They arrive well cooked, hot and in a timely manner.  The delivery drivers are well mannered

name: shanna Saulisbury
text: The owners of this restaurant should be ashamed. To say management needs an overhaul would be an understatement. I visited this location with my family today. Only two employees working and they were less than enthusiastic about their job. …More

name: Philjcksn jcksn
text: Good service with a guick meal.

name: Richard Elliott
text: Everybody has their commercial pizza preference. Pizza Hut. Is mine. I suppose it is strictly a matter of opinion.

name: Ace Outspoken
text: I ORDERED MY PIZZA AND THEY BROUGHT IT TO ME 20 MIN LATE. ITS FUNNY HOW THEY BROUGHT IT TO ME LATE AND THEY BROUGHT IT COLD. THANKS FOR HORRIBLE SERVICE

name: Charlysc Bt
text: Great choice of beer and excellent quality.

name: Cherith Williams
text: Jeri-Lyn, the manager, was amazing. We had my son's birthday party there and she had tables set up and food prepared when we got there!!  Everything was perfect!

name: Tim Scott
text: Pretty much screw up every order I make. Made a online order and was charged full price when I was supposed to get a large 2 topping pizza for 7.99. I have now stopped going there.

name: Bridgett Clark
text: There was a problem with the pizza hut website and using the tmobile promotion. The manager went ahead and took care of it fir us

name: Keah Trimble
text: Nice hot and ready

name: Somsee Rasamee
text: Some employee can't read,got shorted on toppings. Kids not Happy

name: linda jenkins
text: The service was fast and good

name: Shay Williams
text: Horrible!!!! Never have i had such nasty customer service! Called to place an order got transferred to their hot line. Then go to pick up the order Mike then tells me they dont have it is then yelling at me once i try to replace the over in the store. NEVER AGAIN.

name: ThatOneBitch F
text: This place sucks, food was cold, poorly mad please don't order here called about this issue was told they would refund my money nother zero refund its been 4 days.... Poor customer service poor food RUN! DO NOT ORDER FROM THIS LOCATION

name: Nicole Shelatz
text: Had to give 1 star to give review. This place has the worst food and they do not even know how to make a pizza right,no sauce on the pizza it was stone cold and hard as a rock asked for mushrooms on it and got 2 pieces of mushrooms on the whole thing. No sauce for breadsticks.Totally horrid place

name: Josephine Gillard
text: I just love there wing

name: Carlos Silva
text: Every time I need pizza delivered I order it from this location and I've never had any issues. The only reason I don't give them 5 stars is their prices, because I think they are too high. But the service has always been great.

name: stacy edwards
text: Pizza tasted different I was not pleased

name: Trella Davis
text: Wonderful pizza!! Prompt delivery

name: Regina A
text: When you wait FOREVER for your pizza to be delivered and it shows up with no sauce and extremely minimal cheese (like literally on ONE piece).... Call to let them know and their attitude is indifferent and they tell you it's 80 minutes to get another out to you. I will NOT be ordering from them again; what a waste of my $30+ dollars.

name: John Smith
text: The pizza was good but one of them went through the oven without a topping and they thought it was a good idea just to throw it on there and put it in the box and hand it to me.

name: Brittany Frazier
text: I love Pizza Hut my favorite pizza place

name: terry campbell
text: They didn't have my order. Had to redo it. Just a error.

name: Lema Bean
text: Wonderful, hot food. Great service!

name: Randy Bouchillon
text: Beautiful Entertainment Venue

name: matternk
text: Decent but they always forget at least one ingredient and always take a long time. First time we ordered, it took more than two hours, since then it's never been less than 40 minutes.  If it wasn't for their delicious stuffed crust, I would not get pizza here.

name: rels 14
text: I have used this Pizza Hut twice now. Each time has been horrible. The first time there was a hair in my pizza I called back to report it, and expected to get a pizza remade and the employee asked what I expected them to do about it. When I …More

name: edward Stone
text: It was so fresh

name: rod Jones
text: How do you not have breadsticks?  Didn't offer any kind of comp.  What a joke.

name: Tate Keplinger
text: Made my final delivery purchase with this location tonight. I have never recieved an order correctly - it is usually just one or two issues like a missing topping or the pizza not being cut, but tonight the order was completely incorrect. …More

name: ocean bella
text: The manager was really nice

name: Jaime Barnes
text: Picked up a pizza last night. Would have returned it if the 3 kids I had weren't hungry. The dough was flat in the inside, like it was a thin pizza, but was a hand tossed. I asked for it to be sliced into 16 slices...it wasn't. I haven't …More

name: Dominique Brown
text: Horrible service! I placed an order and waited over an hour. I called back inquiring about my delivery only to be informed that the employee voided my order and forgot to call me back. I spoke with a very nonchalant manager about the …More

name: Shaianne Roland
text: I am just absolutely disgusted with this location at this point. I placed an order at about 130. I received my order an hour later, which is already a problem. The pizza was absolutely horrifying. Both pizzas were cold, not even like warm, …More

name: Matt Powell
text: Placed an order for 6 pizzas at about 10:30 AM for pickup at 3:30 PM and had to wait 45 minutes for them to make them. I'll never go back and hope they go out of business soon.

name: Jenn Ashly
text: Great overall but sometimes low staffing makes for slow service.  If you go during normal meal times no problem.

name: Mark Ponce
text: Worst customer service ever. Delivery was over 3 hours late, the local store wouldn't  answer the phone (they would pick up and immediately hang up) and the the pizza was cold when it finally arrived 3 hours late!!! DO NOT ORDER FROM THIS STORE!!!

name: Ashley Blackthorn
text: The breadsticks gave me food poisoning. You can get better quality pizza from little ceasars for 5 bucks. Don't waist your money.

name: Charlotte Lewis
text: Ordered at 7:15 pm with an estimated delivery time of 8:45. It's currently 11:15 and I'm done waiting. Never ordering delivery from here again.

name: Michael Griffin
text: Always on time.

name: Kevin Keller
text: Pizza is good, but service is very slow.

name: Zach Van Slam
text: This pizza hut is always bangn.

name: L Gram
text: Waited over an hour for a delivery and everything included in the Big Box was cold! And each slice maybe had 4 hamburger meat each.....SMH...

text: Quick service. Pizza smells and looks delicious!

text: Awful service!! Ordered a pizza told the guy my name and 15mins later my husband goes to get my order only to find that it was never placed. The manager is just as rude as the associates. Don't order here!!

Always good from here and to me.
